project.name: batchexport
project.description: Shows how barcodes multiple reports could be concatenated during export.

target.name: javac
target.description: Compiles the java source files of the test application.

target.name: compile
target.description: Compiles the XML report designs and produces the .jasper files.

target.name: fill
target.description: Fills the compiled report design with data and produces the .jrprint file.

target.name: view1
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the first report stored in the .jrprint file.

target.name: view2
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the second report stored in the .jrprint file.

target.name: view3
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the third report stored in the .jrprint file.

target.name: pdf
target.description: Generates a PDF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: rtf
target.description: Generates an RTF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xls
target.description: Generates an XLS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file using the POI library.

target.name: jxl
target.description: Generates an XLS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file using the JExcelApi library.

target.name: csv
target.description: Generates a CSV version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: odt
target.description: Generates an ODT version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: viewDesignXML1
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the first XML report design.

target.name: viewDesignXML2
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the second XML report design.

target.name: viewDesignXML3
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the third XML report design.

target.name: viewDesign1
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the first compiled report design.

target.name: viewDesign2
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the second compiled report design.

target.name: viewDesign3
target.description: Launches the design viewer to preview the third compiled report design.
